attributes.action: provide free access for young people to sports/leisure clubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a system whereby all young people (or at least all those from low income families) are given credit to use solely for use in paying for club fees, e.g. local football clubs, scouts, to encourage them to use their spare time productively and increase their socials skills and not hang about
